about_the_game:
Heroes of the Nam Battle Pack 1 brings the award-winning Lock ’n Load Tactical Series to the war in Vietnam. This squad-level game, with its fast-paced, intense impulse system, drops you right into the middle of furious jungle firefights and all-out, building-to-building assaults.




FEATURES
Heroes of the Nam Battle Pack 1 brings the forces from the Army of the Republic of Vietnam (ARVN), the United States Army and Marines, as well as their valiant Anzac allies from Australia and New Zealand, take on determined enemies from the North Vietnamese Army (NVA) and the unpredictable Viet Cong (VC). Heroes of the Nam Battle Pack 1 includes 12 scenarios, bringing to life powerfully armed Squads are at the vanguard of all actions, spurred on by daring Leaders and other unique individuals such as Snipers, Medics, Corpsmen, Chaplains, Advisors and, of course, Heroes, whose unique skills and sudden appearance can alter the tide of any battle. Helicopters, tanks and armored personnel carriers (APCs) also join the fight. Test your mettle in over 12 action-packed scenarios. Only the heroic will be victorious.



Scenarios Included

  • Weapons Cache
  • Ap Bac
  • Operation Starlite - Hotel Company
  • Sky Soldiers
  • Undeniable Courage
  • Battle of Chin Dhuc/Duc Hanh
  • Mines and Men
  • The Battle of Long Tan
  • Ambush!
  • Assault on Ben Suc
  • The Marketplace Massacre
  • Search and Destroy
  • A Friend in Need
